name: Scram Kitty DX
description:
Take control of Buddy, a rail-riding, laser-shooting young hero on a perilous quest to rescue his pet cat, Scram Kitty!

Kidnapped and imprisoned in the depths of the World's biggest orbiting space laboratory, along with all of Earth's cats, Scram Kitty is at the mercy of an army of experimental mechanized rodents. As you use your magnetic Spinboard to ride energy rails deeper and deeper into the station you will have to defeat the twisted mouse creations of an experiment gone terribly wrong. With a unique control system that allows for full 360 degree platforming action and thrilling 2D shooting, Scram Kitty DX will see you glide along glowing rails, leap across chasms and create arcing streams of shots as you rid each stage of its rodent aggressors and rescue all the cats imprisoned within.

Purchasing this content entitles you to both the PS4™ and “PS Vita” versions!



1 player
140MB minimum save size
DUALSHOCK®4
1080p HD Video Output

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service).
